calendar

Class Day

  • java.lang.Object
    • calendar.Day

  • public class Day
extends java.lang.Object
    Day class "Day" represents a single day. It determines where on the calendar to put each day and how to read/write to the database. Each "Day" has a corresponding DayView that handles user interface elements.
